Text:
However, if I was to put out a movie from Armenia, I think I would immediately think of adding Finnish subs to it.  
You know, that comments about subtitles are about the only comments I get from Finns, and pretty much no comments at all about Finnish movies, even though they are fairly popular.

Bump!

Leaving for Armenia in June with the Peace Corps. Will be there for over two years and would love to be able to watch this before I go. Please seed =)
